It is not a law, no…

It’s always the ugly people who refuse to wear a mask on a plane…

RT @SpookdBlog: I'm reminded of airline flight crews announcing the wearing of the mask on flights is a "federal law".

It is not a law, no…

I'm reminded of airline flight crews announcing the wearing of the mask on flights is a "federal law".

It is not a law, nor is it enforceable - although most flight crews will throw you off the plane if you don't "comply". https://t.co/EKsdy6ifDU
@alwebbj You are so full of BS! If you want to fly on a plane ✈️ you will happily wear that mask! If you want a job guess what you’ll thankfully get the vaccine!
